item.title: Video Editor for Course Materials - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a video editor who can create high-quality videos for course materials.

You'll be given the script (text) and audio, and you'll need to deliver the final video 3-minute video.

This is a one-time gig, but it could lead to ongoing work.

item.title: Video Editor with After Effects Skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a video editor who can add a simple effect to a 5-20 second video using After Effects/Premiere Pro or whatever tool they feel most comfortable with.
This is a one time thing and I'm happy to leave a good feedback.
The effect to be added is simple. Here is the effect. If you can do this exact effect apply.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/14Jz4gS-ABtq3XMIskR5gB1rgQmKKeKqH/view?usp=sharing

I'd like you to teach me to do the effect as well.  :)

item.title: Easy editing task for a short 2min video - Upwork
item.description:
I have a short 2 min video interview which consistst of 3 parts. Part 1 is an intro, parts 2 and 3 are answers to a question.  What I need to be done is the following:

- transition design between parts 1-2 and 2-3. They should just show the question asked to a person.

- subtitles design to parts 2 and 3, so the text of the questions asked should be visible on the bottom part.

- noise reduction and volume increase, if possible.

The task should be finished in 2-3 days.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 19:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing
Skills: Audio Editing
Country: Bulgaria
click to apply

item.title: Help me Edit and Brighten Up a Singular Interview Video - Upwork
item.description:
This is an interview I did with my grandmother, and this is a personal and important family item. I don't have much money, but I recorded this a bit darker than I would have liked. I would like your help to brighten up and edit this video to leave it as good as you can possibly get it. This is only for one video.

It will be an MP4 file.

Thank you!

item.title: Instagram Reels and Ads Creator for Travel Work - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an independent and creative individual who excels in creating engaging Instagram reels and ads for my travel work.
As a creator, you will be responsible for incorporating smooth transitions and applying effective color grading techniques to enhance the visual appeal of our content.
The footage will be from iPhone or DJI drone. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the Instagram platform and its video features. If you have a keen eye for detail, a passion for travel, and the ability to craft compelling visuals, we'd love to work with you.

Skills:
- Instagram reels creation
- Video editing
- Transitions
- Color grading

Please send your portfolio with relevant work highlighted.

This is for long term work and I need someone to start asap


Posted On: June 21, 2024 18:46 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Advertising, Facebook
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Advertising, Facebook
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Corporate Event Videographer and/or Photographer: July 8 in Brussels - Upwork
item.description:
My company is looking to hire a videographer and/or photographer for an in-person event on July 8 from 5-9pm in Brussels, Belgium. Ideally, we are looking for 2 videographers and 1 photographer to cover the duration of the event. One videographer would be responsible for recording the full length of 2 panels taking place during the event. The other videographer would be responsible for all b-roll footage of attendees, branding, stage presentations, etc. For deliverables, we are looking for 1. photos captured throughout the event, 2. a 1-2 min highlight reel of the event, and 3. the full recordings of each panel (~45 min each). We will provide previous highlight reels to your team for guidance and expectations.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 18:44 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Photography, Videography, Event Photography, Video Editing
Skills: Photography, Videography, Event Photography, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as Bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You’re responsible for creating engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.

Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

2. https://www.youtube.com/@RecollectionRoad
3. https://www.youtube.com/@AmericaBefore

Requirements:
1.  English expert
2. Professional software
3. 48H Or less turnaround time
4. Willing to work long term and grow with the team


(10 Videos For $300)

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Look forward to receiving your work.

Budget: $300

item.title: Virtual Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
Part-Time (10-15 hours per week)


Description:
We are seeking a versatile individual to join our team, who will not only focus on video editing and PR outreach but also assist with administrative tasks. The ideal candidate will be skilled in creating compelling video content, adept at PR outreach, and efficient in handling administrative duties to support our team.

Key Responsibilities:

Video Editing:

Edit and produce high-quality video content for various platforms.
Collaborate with the content team to ensure the final product aligns with the desired message and brand guidelines.

Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and techniques.
PR Outreach:

Identify and reach out to relevant podcasts and platforms where our CEO can be featured.
Build and maintain relationships with podcast hosts and producers.
Coordinate schedules and ensure smooth communication between our CEO and the podcast teams.

Administrative Support:

Manage and maintain executive calendars, including scheduling appointments, meetings, and events.
Assist with day-to-day administrative tasks such as email management, data entry, and document preparation.
Coordinate with team members to ensure smooth operations and efficient workflow.
Handle any other administrative functions as needed to support the team.


Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing.
Familiarity with popular video editing software and tools.
Prior experience in PR or outreach roles.
Strong organizational skills with an ability to multitask.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Proficiency in using office software and tools.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.








Hourly Range: $7.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 18:35 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Light Project Management, Virtual Assistance, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Partnership & Collaborations Outreach, Public Relations Strategy
Skills: Light Project Management, Virtual Assistance, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Partnership & Collaborations Outreach, Public Relations Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Bilingual UGC Content Video Creator for Language Learning App - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented bilingual UGC content video creator to join our team and help us create engaging and educational videos for our language learning app. The app is Umi and we are focused on those who want to learn Japanese, Korean, French or Spanish. The ideal candidate should be fluent in English, and either of these languages mentioned as well as have a strong understanding of the target language and culture. You will be responsible for brainstorming video concepts, filming, and editing high-quality videos. We will provide a general script and guidelines. We are looking for someone with a creative mindset, excellent communication skills, and a passion for language learning. If you are a self-motivated individual with a keen eye for detail and a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you. Bonus if you like anime and learned literature from TV.

Skills:
- Bilingual proficiency in either Spanish, Korean, Japanese, or French
- Strong understanding of the target language and culture
- Video production and editing skills
- Creative thinking and storytelling
- Excellent communication skills
- Self-motivated and detail-oriented

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 21, 2024 18:25 UTC
Category: Language Tutoring
Skills:Video Editing, English, Video Production, Voice-Over, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, English, Video Production, Voice-Over, Graphic Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
